thread.title: BRIEF-Cematrix Corp Announces Letter Of Intent For Proposed Acquisition Of Mixonsite USA

title: BRIEF-Cematrix Corp Announces Letter Of Intent For Proposed Acquisition Of Mixonsite USA

organizations.name: brief-cematrix corp announces letter of intent for proposed acquisition of mixonsite usa

text: 17 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Cematrix Corp Announces Letter Of Intent For Proposed Acquisition Of Mixonsite USA Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Cematrix Corp: * CEMATRIX CORPORATION ANNOUNCES LETTER OF INTENT FOR PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF MIXONSITE USA INC. * CEMATRIX CORP - ‍CURRENTLY ANTICIPATED THAT ACQUISITION WILL OCCUR AS A SHARE SALE * CEMATRIX CORP - ‍CONSIDERATION PAID FOR MOS SHARES SHALL APPROXIMATELY BE $5 MILLION AS WELL AS PAYMENT OF EARN-OUT​ * CEMATRIX - ‍ ON CLOSING OF DEAL, OWNER OF MOS, ED WEINER, WHO WILL BECOME A SIGNIFICANT SHAREHOLDER OF CO, HAS AGREED TO BECOME A DIRECTOR OF CO​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
